_source.text: After his return to Rome Tartini recommended Mr. Wiseman, his English friend, to Bini in the following words, which speak as highly for master as for scholar:-'Io lo mando a un mio scolare che suona più di me, e me ne glorio per essere un angelo di costume e religioso'-'I recommend him to a scholar who plays better than myself, and I am proud of it, as he is an angel in religion and morals'.

_source.text: [2] Despite this, Hater acknowledged that Dominator was indeed way more cooler and better than him, a fact which infuriated him, but after discovering that Dominator was in fact a girl ( " The Battle Royale " ), Hater fell madly in love with her after realizing that she was the coolest and most beautiful villain he had ever met, to the point where he spent a long length of time sitting in a daze doing nothing while thinking of her as the "pretty lady".
